mapper.update: update lg_vehicledriverrecords set startingTime = #{startingtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deadLine = #{deadline,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, driverId = #{driverid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `describe` = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, managementType = #{managementtype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remarks1 = #{remarks1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks2 = #{remarks2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where vehicleDriverRecordsId = #{vehicledriverrecordsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select vehicleDriverRecordsId, startingTime, deadLine, driverId, `describe`, managementType, remarks1, remarks2 from lg_vehicledriverrecords where vehicleDriverRecordsId = #{vehicledriverrecordsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select vehicleDriverRecordsId, startingTime, deadLine, driverId, `describe`, managementType, remarks1, remarks2 from lg_vehicledriverrecords
